Acts evasively and nervously when questioned by the COP, struggles to maintain composure, gives unclear instructions about phone use, locks the COP in the Library hastily and leaves the key in the lock in a hurry.
Pulls himself together and takes control of the situation by leading the officer confidently through the rooms.
His voice is described as high-pitched in terror, indicating nervousness and lack of calm under pressure.
Attempts to dissuade the officer from entering the Study by fabricating a reason, showing some presence of mind and situational awareness.
